divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: >Dear sir, my wife and i recently had a disturbing experience in our car 1am oct 18th 2004 in Cheshire England near and around Tattenhall village.What i describe happened this way and not appear to happen,being a skeptic all of my life has made it more essential for me to report this incident and also has dramatically changed my life for it was not a good sign i am sure.I have sent out over a hundred emails to various groups around the world and have spoken to Jenny randles and steven balon [top ufologists]hoping for some sort of answer but to no evail,ive been met sadly with skepticism but can only say this happened, it is true .We had just left friends and were travelling down the burwardsley road ,a rural part of cheshire when suddenly a cloud or vapor appeared from the left of our car.It was short in length but travelling very fast and seemed to wrap itself in front of our car , i naturally braced myself thinking we were hitting some kind of rare thick fog weather condition when suddenly a vortex was spinning ahead of it outside the car,At first i thought it was some kind of tornado but it didnt have a funnel and was close to the ground.I told my wife to slow the car fearing it would damage the car.We entered Tattenhall village and it was gone i remember saying to my wife that we had avoided it,we turned right and left the village on to another country lane when suddenly it re-appeared next to the car,spinning in front then behind,and around the car,my wife kept driving trying to escape it but it kept up with our car,The next thing we know our car bonnet lit up white and then suddenly coloured cabbage shapes came on our windscreen[there were hundreds of what looked like to me tiny holes in them],there was no spinning movement at all,it suddenly vanished off our windscreen , the next thing a car overtook us doing about 50 miles per hour soon after the vortex re appeared again and was spinning around our car, but all we could see was colours spinning,[holographic like]it was also alot higher off the ground, soon after i opened my window and looked up to see it about 30 feet over our car moving to the left but could see 2 vortexes one coloured energy like beads spinning and inside a plasma or vapor gas in sections ,round at one end and thinner at the other ,spinning aggresively inside of that in a perfect circle ,it went over to a field to our left and continued to follow the car.We done another right turn on to another country lane and the vortex followed to the ajacent field,just before we got to the motorway it started to slowly ascend right up into the clouds when it disappeared.Once again i can only say this happened the way ive told,although hard to believe ,and have no proof but it is true,it was with our car for about 12 minutes the weather conditions were low storm clouds,we had just had 2 weeks of constant electric storms[which is very unusual for this part of england],this behaved intelligently i am certain,it was moving forwards and backwards without turning,spinning like a catherine wheel and did not seem to be effected by solid objects,this was not anything manmade like lasers, or a rare weather condition,if you would like a more detailed account, email me and i will give you my phone number,Paul
trends: There have been no other sightings in Tattenhall
This sighting has never been favorited.
